<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-size:8pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Name of each exchange on which registered</p></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:38%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000021" name="dei:Security12bTitle" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220110_20220110"><p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Class 2 Common Stock, $0.0001 par<br />value per share</p></ix:nonNumeric></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:1%;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p></td>
<td valign="bottom" style="width:15%; border-top:solid 0.75pt #000000;">
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0pt;;text-indent:0pt;;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000022" name="dei:TradingSymbol" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220110_20220110">TLRY</ix:nonNumeric></p>

<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;&#8201;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;&#8201;240.12b-2 of this chapter).</p>
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Emerging growth company&#160;<span style="font-family:Segoe UI Symbol;"><ix:nonNumeric id="F_000019" name="dei:EntityEmergingGrowthCompany" contextRef="C_0001731348_20220110_20220110" format="ixt-sec:boolballotbox">&#9744;</ix:nonNumeric></span></p>
<p style="margin-top:9pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#160;<span style="font-family:Segoe UI Symbol;">&#9744;</span></p>
<p style="border-bottom:Double 2.25pt;padding-bottom:1pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always" />
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:2pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="margin-top:8pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Item 5.03 Amendments to Articles of Incorporation or Bylaws&#59; Change in Fiscal Year.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">On January 10, 2022, Tilray, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) changed its corporate name to Tilray Brands, Inc., pursuant to a second certificate of amendment of the amended and restated certificate of incorporation of the Company filed with the Delaware Secretary of State on January10, 2022 (the &#8220;Name Change&#8221;). &#160;Pursuant to Delaware law, a shareholder vote was not necessary to effectuate the Name Change and it does not affect the rights of the Company&#8217;s shareholders. The Company also amended and restated its Bylaws on January 10, 2022, to reflect the Name Change.</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:10pt;">&#160;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">A copy of the Company&#8217;s Second Certificate of Amendment of the Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation (the &#8220;Certificate of Amendment&#8221;) and the Amended and Restated Bylaws are filed as Exhibits 3.1 and 3.2, respectively, with this Current Report on Form 8-K and are incorporated herein by reference. The only change effectuated by the Certificate of Amendment and the Amended and Restated Bylaws is the change of the Company&#8217;s corporate name from Tilray, Inc. to Tilray Brands, Inc. in each document.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:18pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#160;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Exhibit 3.1</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:7pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:4.99%;margin-right:0.18%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;color:#0A080A;font-size:11.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SECOND CERTIFICATE OF AMENDMENT OF <br /><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">THE AMENDED AND RESTATED <br />CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION <br />OF</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;line-height:13pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.99%;margin-right:0.18%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;color:#0A080A;font-size:11.5pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">TILRAY,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>INC.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:13pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:13pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:2.59%;text-indent:6.65%;color:#0A080A;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The undersigned, for the purposes of amending the amended and restated certificate of incorporation of Tilray, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">Corporation</font>&#8221;), does hereby certify<font style="letter-spacing:0.15pt;"> </font>that:</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-right:3.33%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.66%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ONE:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The original certificate of incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of the Corporation (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;">Original</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;">Certificate</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;)</font><font style="font-style:italic;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">was filed with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware on January 24, 2018, thereby</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">causing the Corporation to become organized and existing under and by virtue of the General Corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Law</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.55pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-1.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">State of Delaware,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.65pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-1.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">amended</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.6pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(the</font><font style="font-style:italic;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;">DGCL</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;).</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.96%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">TWO:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The amended and restated certificate of incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of the Corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8220;</font><font <p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.93%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">THREE:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The amended and restated certificate of incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of the Corporation</font><font Restated</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;">Certificate</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;),</font><font Dela</font><font style="color:#26232B;font-weight:normal;">w</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">are on</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font <p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.68%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FOUR:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The certificate of retirement of Class 1 common stock of the </font><font style="color:#26232B;font-weight:normal;">C</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">orporation (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;">Certificate of Retirement</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;),</font><font style="font-style:italic;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">which amended certain</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provisions of the Second Amended and Restated Certificate, was filed with the Secretary of State of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">State</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.65pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Delaware</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.55pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">October</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.55pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">1,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">2020.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.7%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">FIVE:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The certificate of amendment (the &#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;">First Certificate of Amendment</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;), which amended certain provisions of the Second Amended and Restated Certificate, was filed with the Secretary of State of the State of Delaware on September 10, 2021.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.7%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.7%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SIX:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">This second certificate of amendment amends certain provisions of the Second Amended and Restated Certificate, as amended by the Certificate of Retirement and the First Certificate of Amendment (as so amended, the &#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;">Existing Certificate</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8221;) and shall become effective at the time of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">filing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.9pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.6pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">State</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of the State of Delaware.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.64%;font-weight:bold;color:#0C0C0C;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">SEVEN:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.6pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">text</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">amended</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">restated</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.65pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-1.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entirety</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">follows:</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.7%;color:#0C0C0C;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;The name of this corporation shall be <font style="font-weight:bold;font-variant: small-caps;">Tilray Brands, Inc.</font><font style="font-weight:bold;"> </font>(the &#8220;<font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:italic;">Company</font>&#8221;).&#8221;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:3pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.64%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">EIGHT:<font style="margin-left:162pt;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The foregoing amendment to the Existing Certificate has been duly adopted by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the Board of Directors of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.6pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">accordance</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provisions</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">DGCL.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:3pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.64%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:3pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.64%;font-weight:bold;font-size:11pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">NINE<font style="font-weight:normal;">:</font><font style="font-weight:normal;margin-left:162pt;">Other than as set forth in this second certificate of amendment, the Existing Certificate shall remain in full force and effect, without modification, amendment or change.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-top:3pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.14%;text-indent:6.64%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-right:0.18%;text-indent:0%;letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">[THIS<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>SPACE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.55pt;"> </font>INTENTIONALLY<font style="letter-spacing:1.1pt;"> </font>LEFT<font style="letter-spacing:0.35pt;"> </font>BLANK]</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:12pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:3pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:2.03%;text-indent:4.54%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">The Corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">has</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">caused</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.3pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;">Second Certificate of </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Amendment</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.6pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">of</font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"> the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Amended</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.7pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Restated</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.6pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.75pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">of Incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">to be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">signed</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.2pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Global</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.2pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">General</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Counsel</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.5pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">January 10, 2022</font><font style="font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:49.91%;text-indent:5.82%;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">TILRAY,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>INC.</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:55.73%;margin-right:22.18%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">/s/<font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>Mitchell<font style="letter-spacing:1.15pt;"> </font>Gendel<font style="letter-spacing:-2.5pt;"> </font>Mitchell<font style="letter-spacing:0.2pt;"> </font>Gendel</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:55.73%;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Global<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>General<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>Counsel<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>Corporate<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>Secretary</p>
<p style="text-align:justify;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:7.49%;margin-right:3.33%;text-indent:6.66%;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:10pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Exhibit 3.2</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">AMENDED<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>AND<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>RESTATED<font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">BYLAWS</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>OF</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">TILRAY BRANDS,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">INC.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(A DELAWARE CORPORATION)<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Effective January 10, 2022</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>I</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OFFICES</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>1.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Registered<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Office<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">registered</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">office</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">State</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Delaware</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">City</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Wilmington,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">County</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">New</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Castle.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>2.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Other<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Offices.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">also</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">maintain</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">office</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">principal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">place</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">place</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the Board of Directors, and may also have offices at such other places, both within and without the State of Delaware, as the Board of Directors may</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">determine</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">require.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.59%;margin-right:42.6%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE II<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;">CORPORATE</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">SEAL</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 3. Corporate Seal. <font style="font-weight:normal;">The Board of Directors may adopt a corporate seal. If adopted, the corporate seal shall consist of a die bearing the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">name</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">inscription,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">&#8220;Corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Seal-Delaware.&#8221;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Said</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">seal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">used</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">causing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">it</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">facsimile</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereof</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">impressed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">affixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">reproduced</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">otherwise.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:10pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:38.46%;margin-right:38.5%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE III<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">STOCKHOLDERS&#8217;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.5pt;"> </font>MEETINGS</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>4.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Place<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Meetings.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">held</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">place,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">either</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">within</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">State</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Delaware, as may be determined from time to time by the Board of Directors. The Board of Directors may, in its sole discretion, determine that the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting shall not be held at any place, but may instead be held solely by means of remote communication as provided under the Delaware General</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Law</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(&#8220;DGCL&#8221;).</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>5.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Annual<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Meeting<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The annual meeting of the stockholders of the corporation, for the purpose of election of directors and for such other business as may</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">properly come before it, shall be held on such date and at such time as may be designated from time to time by the Board of Directors. Nominations of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">persons for election to the Board of Directors of the corporation and the proposal of business to be considered by the stockholders may be made at an</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders:</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(i)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation&#8217;s</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">nominations);</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(ii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">brought</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">specifically</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">direction</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(iii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">who</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">was</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time of giving the stockholder&#8217;s notice provided for in Section 5(b) below, who is entitled to vote at the meeting and who complied with the notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">procedures set forth in Section 5. For the avoidance of doubt, clause (iii) above shall be the exclusive means for a stockholder to make nominations and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">submit</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">matters</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">properly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">included</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation&#8217;s</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">statement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.5%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Rule<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>14a-8<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>under<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Securities<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Exchange<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Act<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>1934,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>as<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>amended,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>rules<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>regulations<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>thereunder<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>(the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>&#8220;1934<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Act&#8221;))<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>before<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>an<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>annual<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>stockholders.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:4.46%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">At</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">only</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">conducted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proper</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">matter</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">action</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Delaware</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">properly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">brought</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">before</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">For nominations for the election to the Board of Directors to be properly brought before an annual meeting by a stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">pursuant to clause (iii) of Section 5(a), the stockholder must deliver written notice to the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">on a timely basis as set forth in Section 5(b)(3) and must update and supplement such written notice on a timely basis as set forth in Section 5(c). Such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">stockholder&#8217;s notice shall set forth: (A) as to each nominee such stockholder proposes to nominate at the meeting: (1) the name, age, business address</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">residence</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">address</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">nominee,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">(2)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">principal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">occupation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">employment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">nominee,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">(3)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">capital stock of the corporation which are owned of record and beneficially by such nominee, (4) the date or dates on which such shares were acquired</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and the investment intent of such acquisition and (5) such other information concerning such nominee as would be required to be disclosed in a proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">statement soliciting proxies for the election of such nominee as a director in an election contest (even if an election contest is not involved), or that is</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">required</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">disclosed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">14</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">1934</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">rules</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">regulations</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">promulgated</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">thereunder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">(including</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">person&#8217;s</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">written consent to being named as a nominee and to serving as a director if elected); and (B) the information required by Section 5(b)(4). The</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation may require any proposed nominee to furnish such other information as it may reasonably require to determine the eligibility of such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">proposed nominee to serve as an independent director of the corporation or that could be material to a reasonable stockholder&#8217;s understanding of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">independence,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">lack</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">thereof,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">proposed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">nominee.</font></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.78%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;">(2)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">proposals</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">sought</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">included</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">1934</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Act,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">properly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">brought</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">before</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font </font><font style="color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">clause (iii) of Section 5(a), the stockholder must deliver written notice to the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the corporation on a timely</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">basis as set forth in Section 5(b)(3), and must update and supplement such written notice on a timely basis as set forth in Section 5(c). Such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">stockholder&#8217;s notice shall set forth: (A) as to each matter such stockholder proposes to bring before the meeting, a brief description of the business</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">desired to be brought before the meeting, the reasons for conducting such business at the meeting, and any material interest (including any anticipated</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">benefit of such business to any Proponent (as defined below) other than solely as a result of its ownership of the corporation&#8217;s capital stock, that is</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">material to any Proponent individually, or to the Proponents in the aggregate) in such business of any Proponent; and (B) the information required by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">5(b)(4).</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.5%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">To be timely, the written notice required by Section 5(b)(1) or 5(b)(2) must be received by the Secretary at the principal</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">executive offices of the corporation not later than the close of business on the ninetieth (90</font><font style="font-size:7.5pt;color:#000000;">th</font><font style="color:#000000;">) day nor earlier than the close of business on the one</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">hundred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font <p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.96%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(30)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:22pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">days after the anniversary of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting, notice by the stockholder to be timely must be so received not earlier than the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">close of business on the one hundred twentieth (120</font><font style="font-size:7.5pt;color:#000000;">th</font><font style="color:#000000;">) day prior to such annual meeting and not later than the close of business on the later of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">ninetieth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font
