style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">unless</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">nominated</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">either</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">accordance</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">clause</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(ii) of Section 5(a), or in accordance with clause (iii) of Section 5(a). Except as otherwise required by law, the chairperson of the meeting shall have the<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>power and duty to determine whether a nomination or any business proposed to be brought before the meeting was made, or proposed, as the case may<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>be, in accordance with the procedures set forth in these Bylaws and, if any proposed nomination or business is not in compliance with these Bylaws, or<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>the Proponent does not act in accordance with the representations in Sections 5(b)(4)(D) and 5(b)(4)(E), to declare that such proposal or nomination<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>shall<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>not<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>be<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>presented<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>for<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>stockholder<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>action<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>at<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>shall<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>be<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>disregarded,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>notwithstanding<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>that<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>proxies<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>in<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>respect<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>such<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>nominations<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>such<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>business<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>may<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>have<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>been<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>solicited<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>received.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(f)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:66pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Notwithstanding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">foregoing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provisions</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">5,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">order</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">include</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">information</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proposal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">statement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">form</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders&#8217;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">must</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">also</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">comply</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">requirements</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">1934</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rules and regulations thereunder. Nothing in these Bylaws shall be deemed to affect any rights of stockholders to request inclusion of proposals in the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation&#8217;s proxy statement pursuant to Rule 14a-8 under the 1934 Act; </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided, however, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that any references in these Bylaws to the 1934 Act or the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rules and regulations thereunder are not intended to and shall not limit the requirements applicable to proposals and/or nominations to be considered</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">5(a)(iii).</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:9.77%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:2.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">(g)</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">For</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">purposes</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Sections</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">5</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6,</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:13.69%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:2.27%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">(1)</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">&#8220;affiliates&#8221;</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">&#8220;associates&#8221;</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">meanings</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">Rule</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">405</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">Securities</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">Act</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">1933,</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">amended</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">(the</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">&#8220;1933<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Act&#8221;);</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8220;Derivative Transaction&#8221; means any agreement, arrangement, interest or understanding entered into by, or on behalf or for the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">benefit</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Proponent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">affiliates</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">associates,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">whether</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">beneficial:</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">(A)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">value</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">derived</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">whole</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">part</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">value of any class or series of shares or other securities of the corporation, (B) which otherwise provides any direct or indirect opportunity to gain or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">share in any gain derived from a change in the value of securities of the corporation, (C) the effect or intent of which is to mitigate loss, manage risk or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">benefit of security value or price changes, or (D) which provides the right to vote or increase or decrease the voting power of, such Proponent, or any of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">its affiliates or associates, with respect to any securities of the corporation, which agreement, arrangement, interest or understanding may include,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">without limitation, any option, warrant, debt position, note, bond, convertible security, swap, stock appreciation right, short position, profit interest,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">hedge, right to dividends, voting agreement, performance-related fee or arrangement to borrow or lend shares (whether or not subject to payment,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">settlement, exercise or conversion in any such class or series), and any proportionate interest of such Proponent in the securities of the corporation held</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">by any general or limited partnership, or any limited liability company, of which such Proponent is, directly or indirectly, a general partner or managing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">member;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:3.21%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8220;public</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">announcement&#8221;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">mean</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">disclosure</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">press</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">release</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">reported</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Dow</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Jones</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">News</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Service,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Associated</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Press</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">comparable national news service or in a document publicly filed by the corporation with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">13,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">14</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">15(d)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">1934</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Act.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>6.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Special<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Meetings<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Special meetings of the stockholders of the corporation (i) may be called, for any purpose as is a proper matter for stockholder action</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under Delaware law, by (A) the Chairman of the Board of Directors, (B) the Chief Executive Officer, or (C) the Board of Directors pursuant to a</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">resolution adopted by a majority of the total number of authorized directors (whether or not there exist any vacancies in previously authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directorships at the time any such resolution is presented to the Board of Directors for adoption), and (ii) solely during the Control Period (as defined in</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section 20 below), shall be called for any purpose as is a proper matter for stockholder action under Delaware law, by the Secretary of the corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">upon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">written</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">request</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">cast</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">less</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">votes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">written</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">request is in compliance with the requirements of Section 6(b) hereof (&#8220;Stockholder-Requested Meeting&#8221;). A request to call a special meeting pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6(a)(ii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">valid</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">accordance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">requirements</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">procedures</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Except</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be required by law, the Board of Directors shall determine, in its sole judgment, the validity of any request under Section 6(a)(ii),</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">including whether</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">request</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">was</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">properly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">compliance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Bylaws.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">For a special meeting called pursuant to Section 6(a)(i), the Board of Directors shall determine the time and place of such special</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting. Following determination of the time and place of the meeting, the Secretary shall cause a notice of meeting to be given to the stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">accordance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provisions</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">7</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Bylaws.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">For</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Stockholder-Requested</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">request</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(i)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">writing,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">signed and dated by a stockholder of record, (ii) set forth the purpose of calling the special meeting and include the information required by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder&#8217;s notice as set forth in Section 5(b)(i) and in Section 5(b)(ii) (for the proposal of business other than nominations), (iii) not be an Excluded</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Request (as defined below), and (iv) be delivered personally or sent by certified or registered mail, return receipt requested, to the Secretary at the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">principal executive offices of the corporation. The stockholder shall also update and supplement such information as required under Section 5(c). If the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board of Directors determines that a request pursuant to Section 6(a)(ii) is valid, the Board shall determine the time and place, if any, of a Stockholder-</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Requested</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Meeting</font><font style="color:#000000;">,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">determination</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>38<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>hereof.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Following<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>determination<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>time<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>place,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>if<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>any,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>meeting,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Secretary<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>shall<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>cause<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>a<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>notice<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>to<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>be<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>given<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>to<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>stockholders entitled to vote, in accordance with the provisions of Section 7 of these Bylaws. No business may be transacted at a special meeting,<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>including a Stockholder-Requested Meeting, otherwise than as specified in the notice of meeting. An &#8220;Excluded Request&#8221; shall mean a written request<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>of a stockholder that relates to a nomination for the election to the Board of Directors or other proposals of business (y) previously presented to<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>stockholders<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>at<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>an<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>annual<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>special<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>stockholders<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>held<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>within<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>last<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>twelve<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>(12)<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>months<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>determined<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>from<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>date<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>such<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>new<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>written<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>request<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>is<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>received<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>by<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>corporation,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>(z)<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>to<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>be<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>transacted<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>at<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>an<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>annual<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>special<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>stockholders,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>date<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>which<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>is<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>within<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>next<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>three</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(3)<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>months<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>from<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>date<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>written<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>request<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>is<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>received.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(c)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Nominations of persons for election to the Board of Directors may be made at a special meeting of stockholders at which directors are</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">elected</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(i)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(ii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">who</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">giving notice provided for in this paragraph, who shall be entitled to vote at the meeting and who delivers written notice to the Secretary of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">setting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">information</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">required</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">5(b)(1).</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">In</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">event</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">calls</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of electing one or more directors to the Board of Directors, any such stockholder of record may nominate a person or persons (as the case may be), for</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">election to such position(s) as specified in the corporation&#8217;s notice of meeting, if written notice setting forth the information required by Section 5(b)(1)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of these Bylaws shall be received by the Secretary at the principal executive offices of the corporation not later than the close of business on the later of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the ninetieth (90</font><font style="font-size:7.5pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">th</font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">) day prior to such meeting or the tenth (10</font><font style="font-size:7.5pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">th</font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">) day following the day on which public announcement is first made of the date of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">special meeting and of the nominees proposed by the Board of Directors to be elected at such meeting. The stockholder shall also update and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">supplement such information as required under Section 5(c). In no event shall an adjournment or a postponement of a special meeting for which notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">has been given, or the public announcement thereof has been made, commence a new time period for the giving of a stockholder&#8217;s notice as described</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">above.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.67%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section 6, a stockholder must also comply with all applicable requirements of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">1934</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rules</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">regulations</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thereunder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">matters</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Nothing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Bylaws</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">deemed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">affect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any rights of stockholders to request inclusion of proposals in the corporation&#8217;s proxy statement pursuant to Rule 14a-8 under the 1934 Act; </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided,</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">however, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that any references in these Bylaws to the 1934 Act or the rules and regulations thereunder are not intended to and shall not limit the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">requirements applicable to nominations for the election to the Board of Directors and/or proposals of other business to be considered pursuant to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6(a)(ii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">considered</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">6(c)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Bylaws.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 7. Notice of Meetings. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Except as otherwise provided by law, notice, given in writing or by electronic transmission, of each meeting of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">given</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">less</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">ten</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(10)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">nor</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">sixty</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(60)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">days</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">before</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">specify</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">place,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">hour,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">case</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meetings,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">purposes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">means</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">remote communications, if any, by which stockholders and proxy holders may be deemed to be present in person and vote at any such meeting. If</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">mailed, notice is given when deposited in the United States mail, postage prepaid, directed to the stockholder at such stockholder&#8217;s address as it appears</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on the records of the corporation.
