Notice of the time, place, if any, and purpose of any meeting of stockholders may be waived in writing, signed by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereof</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">electronic</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">transmission</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">either</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">before</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">after</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">will</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">waived</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by his or her attendance thereat in person, by remote communication, if applicable, or by proxy, except when the stockholder attends a meeting for the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">express purpose of objecting, at the beginning of the meeting, to the transaction of any business because the meeting is not lawfully called or convened.</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Any stockholder so waiving notice of such meeting shall be bound by the proceedings of any such meeting in all respects as if due notice thereof had</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">given.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 8. Quorum. <font style="font-weight:normal;">At all meetings of stockholders, except where otherwise provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by statute or by the Certificate of Incorporation, or by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">these Bylaws, the presence, in person, by remote communication, if applicable, or by proxy duly authorized, of the holders of one-third of the voting</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">power of the outstanding shares of stock entitled to vote shall constitute a quorum for the transaction of business. In the absence of a quorum, any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting of stockholders may be adjourned, from time to time, either by the chairperson of the meeting or by vote of the holders of a majority of voting</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">power of the shares represented thereat, but no other business shall be transacted at such meeting. The stockholders present at a duly called or convened</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting, at which a quorum is present, may continue to transact business until adjournment, notwithstanding the withdrawal of enough stockholders to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">leave less than a quorum. Except as otherwise provided by statute or by applicable stock exchange rules, or by the Certificate of Incorporation or these</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Bylaws, in all matters other than the election of directors, the affirmative vote of the majority of the voting power of the shares present in person, by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">remote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">communication,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">applicable,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">represented</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">duly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">generally</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">matter</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the act of the stockholders. Except as otherwise provided by statute, the Certificate of Incorporation or these Bylaws, directors shall be elected by a</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">plurality</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">votes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">present</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">remote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">communication,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">applicable,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">represented</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">generally on the election of directors. Where a separate vote by a class or classes or series is required, except where otherwise provided by statute, by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">applicable stock exchange rules or by the Certificate of Incorporation or these Bylaws, one-third of the voting power of the outstanding shares of such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">class or classes or series, present in person, by remote communication, if applicable, or represented by proxy duly authorized, shall constitute a quorum</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled to take action with respect to that vote on that matter. Except where otherwise provided by statute, by applicable stock exchange rules or by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Bylaws,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">affirmative</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(plurality,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">case</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">election</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or classes or series present in person, by remote communication, if applicable, or represented by proxy at the meeting shall be the act of such class or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">classes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">series.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 9. Adjournment and Notice of Adjourned Meetings. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Any meeting of stockholders, whether annual or special, may be adjourned from</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time to time either by the chairperson of the meeting or by the vote of the holders of a majority of the voting power of the shares present in person, by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">remote communication, if applicable, or represented by proxy at the meeting. When a meeting is adjourned to another time or place, if any, notice need</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">not be given of the adjourned meeting if the time and place, if any, thereof are announced at the meeting at which the adjournment is taken. At the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">adjourned meeting, the corporation may transact any business that might have been transacted at the original meeting. If the adjournment is for more</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thirty</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(30)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">days</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">after</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">adjournment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">new</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">adjourned</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">adjourned</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">given</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.5%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 10. Voting Rights. <font style="font-weight:normal;">For the purpose of determining those stockholders entitled to vote at any meeting of the stockholders, except as</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">otherwise provided by law, only persons in whose names shares stand on the stock records of the corporation on the record date, as provided in</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Section 12 of these Bylaws, shall be entitled to vote at any meeting of stockholders. Every person entitled to vote or execute consents shall have the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">right to do so either in person, by remote communication, if applicable, or by an agent or agents authorized by a proxy granted in accordance with</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Delaware</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">law.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">An</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">agent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">so</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">appointed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">need</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">No</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">voted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">after</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">three</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(3)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">years</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">creation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proxy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provides</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">longer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">period.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 11. Joint Owners of Stock. <font style="font-weight:normal;">If shares or other securities having voting power stand of record in the names of two (2) or more persons,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">whether fiduciaries, members of a partnership, joint tenants, tenants in common, tenants by the entirety, or otherwise, or if two (2) or more persons have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">same</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fiduciary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">relationship</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">respecting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">same</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">given</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">written</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">contrary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">furnished</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">copy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">instrument or order appointing them or creating the relationship wherein it is so provided, their acts with respect to voting shall have the following</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effect:</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(a)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">only</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">one</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(1)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">votes,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">his</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">her</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">binds</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">all;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(b)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">one</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(1)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">votes,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">so</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">voting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">binds</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">all;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(c)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">one</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.14%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:18pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">votes, but the vote is evenly split on any particular matter, each faction may vote the securities in question proportionally, or may apply to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Delaware</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Court</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Chancery</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">relief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">DGCL,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">217(b).</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">If</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">instrument</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">filed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shows</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">that</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">tenancy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">held</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">unequal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">interests,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">even-split</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">subsection</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">(c)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">even-split</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">interest.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 12. List of Stockholders. <font style="font-weight:normal;">The Secretary shall prepare and make, at least ten (10) days before every meeting of stockholders, a complete</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">list</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">said</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">arranged</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">alphabetical</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">order,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">showing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">address</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">registered</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">name</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">list</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">open</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">examination</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">germane</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(a)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a reasonably accessible electronic network, provided that the information required to gain access to such list is provided with the notice of the meeting,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or (b) during ordinary business hours, at the principal place of business of the corporation. In the event that the corporation determines to make the list</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">available on an electronic network, the corporation may take reasonable steps to ensure that such information is available only to stockholders of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">list</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">open</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">examination</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholder</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">during</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">law.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>13.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Action<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Without<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Meeting<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">No</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">action</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">taken</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">except</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">called</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in accordance with these Bylaws, and, at any time other than the Control Period (as defined below), no action shall be taken by the stockholders by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">written</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">consent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">electronic</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">transmission.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>14.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Organization<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.96%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">At every meeting of stockholders, the Chairperson of the Board of Directors, or, if a Chairperson has not been appointed or is absent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">absent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">absent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chairperson</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chosen</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by a majority in interest of the stockholders entitled to vote, present in person or by proxy, shall act as chairperson. The Secretary, or, in his or her</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">absence,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Assistant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">do</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">so</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:0.89%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The Board of Directors of the corporation shall be entitled to make such rules or regulations for the conduct of meetings of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">it</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">deem</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">necessary,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">appropriate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">convenient.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rules</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">regulations</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chairperson</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of the meeting shall have the right and authority to prescribe such rules, regulations and procedures and to do all such acts as, in the judgment of such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chairperson, are necessary, appropriate or convenient for the proper conduct of the meeting, including, without limitation, establishing an agenda or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">order of business for the meeting, rules and procedures for maintaining order at the meeting and the safety of those present, limitations on participation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in such meeting to stockholders of record of the corporation and their duly authorized and constituted proxies and such other persons as the chairperson</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall permit, restrictions on entry to the meeting after the time fixed for the commencement thereof, limitations on the time allotted to questions or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">comments</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">participants</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">regulation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">opening</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">closing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">polls</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">balloting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">matters</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">are</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">voted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">ballot.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time of the opening and closing of the polls for each matter upon which the stockholders will vote at the meeting shall be announced at the meeting.</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless and to the extent determined by the Board of Directors or the chairperson of the meeting, meetings of stockholders shall not be required to be</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">held</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">accordance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rules</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">parliamentary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">procedure.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:0.89%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.59%;margin-right:42.6%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>IV<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">DIRECTORS</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>15.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Number<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Term<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Office.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">accordance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of Incorporation. Directors need not be stockholders unless so required by the Certificate of Incorporation. If for any cause, the directors shall not have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">been elected at an annual meeting, they may be elected as soon thereafter as convenient at a special meeting of the stockholders called for that purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">these</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Bylaws.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>16.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Powers.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">affairs</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">managed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">direction</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">except</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font
