style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">statute</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Incorporation.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 17. Classes of Directors. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Subject to the rights of the holders of any series of Preferred Stock to elect additional directors under specified</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">circumstances, following the closing of the initial public offering pursuant to an effective registration statement under the 1933 Act, covering the offer</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and sale of Common Stock of the corporation to the public (the &#8220;Initial Public Offering&#8221;), the directors shall be divided into three classes designated as</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Class I, Class II and Class III, respectively. The Board of Directors is authorized to assign members of the Board of Directors already in office to such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">classes at the time the classification becomes effective. At the first annual meeting of stockholders following the closing of the Initial Public Offering,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">term</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">office</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">I</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">expire</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">I</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">elected</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">full</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">term</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">three</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">years.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">At</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">second</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders following the Initial Public Offering, the term of office of the Class II directors shall expire and Class II directors shall be elected for a full</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">term of three years. At the third annual meeting of stockholders following the Initial Public Offering, the term of office of the Class III directors shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">expire</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">III</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">elected</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">full</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">term</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">three</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">years.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">At</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">succeeding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">elected</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">full</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">term</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">three</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">years</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">succeed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">whose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">terms</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">expire</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">annual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section 17, each director shall serve until his or her successor is duly elected and qualified or<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>until<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>his<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>her<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>earlier<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>death,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>resignation<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>removal.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>No<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>decrease<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>in<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>number<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>directors<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>constituting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Board<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Directors<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>shall<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>shorten<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>term<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>any<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>incumbent<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>director.</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 18. Vacancies. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Unless otherwise provided in the Certificate of Incorporation, and subject to the rights of the holders of any series of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Preferred Stock or as otherwise provided by applicable law, any vacancies on the Board of Directors resulting from death, resignation, disqualification,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">removal or other causes and any newly created directorships resulting from any increase in the number of directors shall, unless the Board of Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">determines</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resolution</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">that</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vacancies</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">newly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">created</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directorships</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">filled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">filled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">only</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">affirmative</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">majority of the directors then in office, even though less than a quorum of the Board of Directors, or by a sole remaining director, and not by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stockholders,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">provided,</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">however</font><font style="font-weight:normal;">,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">that</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">whenever</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">holders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">class</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">classes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stock</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">series</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereof</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">are</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">elect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">one</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the provisions of the Certificate of Incorporation, vacancies and newly created directorships of such class or classes or series shall, unless the Board of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors determines by resolution that any such vacancies or newly created directorships shall be filled by stockholders, be filled by a majority of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">directors elected by such class or classes or series thereof then in office, or by a sole remaining director so elected, and not by the stockholders. Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">director elected in accordance with the preceding sentence shall hold office for the remainder of the full term of the director for which the vacancy was</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">created or occurred and until such director&#8217;s successor shall have been elected and qualified. A vacancy in the Board of Directors shall be deemed to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">exist</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Bylaw</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">case</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">death,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">removal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resignation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">director.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 19. Resignation. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Any director may resign at any time by delivering his or her notice in writing or by electronic transmission to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Secretary, such resignation to specify whether it will be effective at a particular time. If no such specification is made, the Secretary, in his or her</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">discretion, may either (a) require confirmation from the director prior to deeming the resignation effective, in which case the resignation will be deemed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effective upon receipt of such confirmation, or (b) deem the resignation effective at the time of delivery of the resignation to the Secretary. When one or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">more directors shall resign from the Board of Directors, effective at a future date, a majority of the directors then in office, including those who have so</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resigned,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fill</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vacancy</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vacancies,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">take</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">when</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resignation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resignations</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">become</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effective,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and each director so chosen shall hold office for the unexpired portion of the term of the director whose place shall be vacated and until his successor</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">duly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">elected</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">qualified.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>20.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Removal.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:5.88%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Except</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">20(b)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">below</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rights</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">holders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">series</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Preferred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Stock</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">elect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">additional</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">specified</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">circumstances,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">neither</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">nor</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">individual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">removed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">cause.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.5%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Subject to any limitations imposed by applicable law, any individual director or directors may be removed (a) with or without cause,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for so long as the Key Holders (as defined in the Amended and Restated Certificate of Incorporation of the Company) hold or beneficially own a</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority of the voting power of all then-outstanding shares of capital stock of the Company entitled to vote generally at an election of directors (such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">period,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">&#8220;</font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Control</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;color:#000000;">Period</font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">&#8221;),</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">affirmative</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">holders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">voting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">then-outstanding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">capital</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stock</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the Company entitled to vote generally at an election of directors, or (b) with cause by the affirmative vote of the holders of at least 66 2/3% of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">voting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">then-outstanding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">capital</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stock</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Company</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">generally</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">election</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>21.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Meetings.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.14%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Regular</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Meetings.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">restricted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Incorporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">regular</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">held at any time or date and at any place within or without the State of Delaware which has been designated by the Board of Directors and publicized</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">among all directors, either orally or in writing, by telephone, including a voice-messaging system or other system designed to record and communicate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">messages, facsimile, telegraph or telex, or by electronic mail or other electronic means. No further notice shall be required for regular meetings of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.85%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Meetings.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">restricted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Incorporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">held at any time and place within or without the State of Delaware whenever called by the Chairperson of the Board, the Chief Executive Officer or a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:4.28%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(c)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Electronic</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Communications</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Equipment.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">member</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">committee</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thereof,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">participate in a meeting by means of conference telephone or other communications equipment by means of which all persons participating in the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">can</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">hear</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">each</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">participation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">means</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">constitute</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">presence</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Meetings.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">place</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">orally</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">writing,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by telephone, including a voice messaging system or other system or technology designed to record and communicate messages, facsimile, telegraph or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">telex, or by electronic mail or other electronic means, during normal business hours, at least twenty-four (24) hours before the date and time of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting. If notice is sent by US mail, it shall be sent by first class mail, postage prepaid at least three (3) days before the date of the meeting. Notice of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any meeting may be waived in writing or by electronic transmission at any time before or after the meeting and will be waived by any director by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">attendance thereat, except when the director attends the meeting for the express purpose of objecting, at the beginning of the meeting, to the transaction</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">because</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">lawfully</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">called</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">convened.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(e)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Waiver of Notice. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The transaction of all business at any meeting of the Board of Directors, or any committee thereof, however called</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">noticed,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">wherever</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">held,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">valid</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">though</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">it</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">had</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">transacted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">held</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">after</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">regular</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">call</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">notice,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">quorum</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">present</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and if, either before or after the meeting, each of the directors not present who did not receive notice shall sign a written waiver of notice or shall waive</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">electronic</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">transmission.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">All</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">waivers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">filed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">records</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">part</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">minutes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meeting.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;"> </font>22.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>Quorum<font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>Voting<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless the Certificate of Incorporation requires a greater number, and except with respect to questions related to indemnification</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">arising under Section 45 for which a quorum shall be one-third of the exact number of directors fixed from time to time, a quorum of the Board of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">consist</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">exact</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">accordance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of Incorporation; </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided, however, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at any meeting whether a quorum be present or otherwise, a majority of the directors present may adjourn from</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">until</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font
