style="color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Officer.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">preside</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">meetings</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the Board of Directors (if a director), unless the Chairperson of the Board of Directors has been appointed and is present. Unless an officer has been</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">appointed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">control</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of the Board of Directors, have general supervision, direction and control of the business and officers of the corporation. To the extent that a Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive Officer has been appointed and no President has been appointed, all references in these Bylaws to the President shall be deemed references to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the Chief Executive Officer. The Chief Executive Officer shall perform other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duties</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">powers,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.96%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(c)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Duties of President. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The President shall preside at all meetings of the stockholders and at all meetings of the Board of Directors (if a</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director),</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chairperson</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">has</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">appointed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">present.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">another</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">has</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been appointed Chief Executive Officer of the corporation, the President shall be the chief executive officer of the corporation and shall, subject to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">control of the Board of Directors, have general supervision, direction and control of the business and officers of the corporation. The President shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">perform other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other duties and have such other powers, as the Board of Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Duties of Vice Presidents. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">A Vice President may assume and perform the duties of the President in the absence or disability of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President or whenever the office of President is vacant. A Vice President shall perform other duties commonly incident to their office and shall also</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">perform</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duties</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">powers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">has</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">appointed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">absent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;">(e)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Duties of Secretary. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The Secretary shall attend all meetings of the stockholders and of the Board of Directors and shall record all acts</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and proceedings thereof in the minute book of the corporation. The Secretary shall give notice in conformity with these Bylaws of all meetings of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders and of all meetings of the Board of Directors and any committee thereof requiring notice. The Secretary shall perform all other duties</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided for in these Bylaws and other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other duties and have such other powers, as</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the Board of Directors shall designate from time to time. The Chief Executive Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the President</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may direct any Assistant Secretary or other officer to assume and perform the duties of the Secretary in the absence or disability of the Secretary, and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">each Assistant Secretary shall perform other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other duties and have such other powers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">no</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">then</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">serving,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:0.89%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(f)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:66pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Duties of Chief Financial Officer. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The Chief Financial Officer shall keep or cause to be kept the books of account of the corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thorough</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proper</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">render</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">statements</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">financial</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">affairs</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">form</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">often</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">required</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of Directors or the Chief Executive Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the President. The Chief Financial Officer, subject to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">order of the Board of Directors, shall have the custody of all funds and securities of the corporation. The Chief Financial Officer shall perform other</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other duties and have such other powers as the Board of Directors or the Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the President shall designate from time to time. To the extent that a Chief Financial</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer has been appointed and no Treasurer has been appointed, all references in these Bylaws to the Treasurer shall be deemed references to the Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Financial Officer. The President may direct the Treasurer, if any, or any Assistant Treasurer, or the controller or any assistant controller to assume and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">perform the duties of the Chief Financial Officer in the absence or disability of the Chief Financial Officer, and each Treasurer and Assistant Treasurer</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and each controller and assistant controller shall perform other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other duties and have</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">powers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">no</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">then</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">serving,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.6%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(g)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Duties of Treasurer. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Unless another officer has been appointed Chief Financial Officer of the corporation, the Treasurer shall be the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">financial</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">keep</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">cause</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">kept</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">books</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">account</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thorough</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proper</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall render statements of the financial affairs of the corporation in such form and as often as required by the Board of Directors or the Chief Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the President, and, subject to the order of the Board of Directors, shall have the custody of all</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">funds and securities of the corporation. The Treasurer shall perform other duties commonly incident to the office and shall also perform such other</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duties and have such other powers as the Board of Directors or the Chief Executive Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Financial</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Treasurer)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">designate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">time.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>30.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Delegation<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Authority.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">delegate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">powers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">duties</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">agent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notwithstanding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provision</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">hereof.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.5%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>31.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Resignations.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resign</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">giving</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">notice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">writing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">electronic</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">transmission</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or to the Chief Executive Officer, or if no Chief Executive Officer is then serving, the President or to the Secretary. Any such resignation shall be</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effective when received by the person or persons to whom such notice is given, unless a later time is specified therein, in which event the resignation</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall become effective at such later time. Unless otherwise specified in such notice, the acceptance of any such resignation shall not be necessary to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">make</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">it</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">effective.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resignation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">prejudice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">rights,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">contract</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resigning</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>32.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Removal.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">removed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">office</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">either</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">cause,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">affirmative</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the directors in office at the time, or by the unanimous written consent of the directors in office at the time, or by any committee or by the Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">superior</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">upon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">whom</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">removal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">conferred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>VI</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:27.09%;margin-right:27.09%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">EXECUTION<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>OF<font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font>CORPORATE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>INSTRUMENTS<font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font>AND<font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font>VOTING<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>OF<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>SECURITIES<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>OWNED<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>BY<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>THE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>CORPORATION</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 33. Execution of Corporate Instruments. <font style="font-weight:normal;">The Board of Directors may, in its discretion, determine the method and designate the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signatory officer or officers, or other person or persons, to execute on behalf of the corporation any corporate instrument or document, or to sign on</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">behalf</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">name</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">limitation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">enter</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">into</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">contracts</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">behalf</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">except</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">where</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by law or these Bylaws, and such execution or signature shall be binding upon the corporation. All checks and drafts drawn on banks or other</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">depositaries on funds to the credit of the corporation or in special accounts of the corporation shall be signed by such person or persons as the Board of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors shall authorize so to do. Unless authorized or ratified by the Board of Directors or within the agency power of an officer, no officer, agent or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">employee shall have any power or authority to bind the corporation by any contract or engagement or to pledge its credit or to render it liable for any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">amount.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 34. Voting of Securities Owned by the Corporation. <font style="font-weight:normal;">All stock and other securities of other corporations owned or held by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">itself,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">parties</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">capacity,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">voted,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proxies</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereto</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">executed,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">so to do by resolution of the Board of Directors, or, in the absence of such authorization, by the Chairperson of the Board of Directors, the Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">President,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Vice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">President.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.44%;margin-right:42.42%;text-indent:0.05%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE VII<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;">SHARES</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">OF</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.45pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">STOCK</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>35.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Form<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Execution<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Certificates.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">represented</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certificates,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">uncertificated</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">so</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-weight:normal;">provided by resolution or resolutions of the Board of Directors. Certificates for the shares of stock, if any, shall be in such form as is consistent with the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Certificate of Incorporation and applicable law. Every holder of stock in the corporation represented by certificate shall be entitled to have a certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signed by or in the name of the corporation by the Chairperson of the Board of Directors, or the President or any Vice President and by the Treasurer or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Assistant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Treasurer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Secretary</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Assistant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Secretary,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certifying</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">owned</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">him</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">all</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signatures</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on the certificate may be facsimiles.
