In case any officer, transfer agent, or registrar who has signed or whose facsimile signature has been placed upon a</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certificate shall have ceased to be such officer, transfer agent, or registrar before such certificate is issued, it may be issued with the same effect as if he</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">were</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">transfer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">agent,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">registrar</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">issue.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.96%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 36. Lost Certificates. <font style="font-weight:normal;">A new certificate or certificates shall be issued in place of any certificate or certificates theretofore issued by the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation alleged to have been lost, stolen, or destroyed, upon the making of an affidavit of that fact by the person claiming the certificate of stock to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">lost,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stolen,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">destroyed.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">require,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">condition</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">precedent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">issuance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">new</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certificates,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">owner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">lost, stolen, or destroyed certificate or certificates, or the owner&#8217;s legal representative, to agree to indemnify the corporation in such manner as it shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">require or to give the corporation a surety bond in such form and amount as it may direct as indemnity against any claim that may be made against the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">alleged</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">lost,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stolen,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">destroyed.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:5pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>37.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.35pt;"> </font>Transfers<font style="font-weight:normal;">.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:3.57%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Transfers of record of shares of stock of the corporation shall be made only upon its books by the holders thereof, in person or by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">attorney</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">duly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">authorized,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">case</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stock</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">represented</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">certificate,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">upon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">surrender</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">properly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">endorsed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">certificates</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">like</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shares.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">enter</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">into</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">perform</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">agreement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">number</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">one</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">classes</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of stock of the corporation to restrict the transfer of shares of stock of the corporation of any one or more classes owned by such stockholders in any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">prohibited</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>38.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Fixing<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Record<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Dates.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:4.1%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">In order that the corporation may determine the stockholders entitled to notice of or to vote at any meeting of stockholders or any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">adjournment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thereof,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">fix</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">precede</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">upon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">resolution</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">fixing</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">adopted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">more</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">sixty</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(60)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">nor</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">less</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">than</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">ten</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.6%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">(10) days before the date of such meeting. If no record date is fixed by the Board of Directors, the record date for determining stockholders entitled to<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font>notice of or to vote at a meeting of stockholders shall be at the close of business on the day next preceding the day on which notice is given, or if notice<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>is waived, at the close of business on the day next preceding the day on which the meeting is held. A determination of stockholders of record entitled to<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>notice<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>or<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>to<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>vote<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>at<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>a<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>meeting<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>stockholders<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>shall<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>apply<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>to<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>any<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>adjournment<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>meeting;<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;">provided,</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;">however,</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>that<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Board<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Directors<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>may<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>fix<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>a<font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font>new<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>record<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>date<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>for<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>the<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>adjourned<font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;"> </font>meeting.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">In order that the corporation may determine the stockholders entitled to receive payment of any dividend or other distribution or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">allotment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rights</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">exercise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rights</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">change,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">conversion</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">exchange</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stock,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any other lawful action, the Board of Directors may fix, in advance, a record date, which record date shall not precede the date upon which the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">resolution fixing the record date is adopted, and which record date shall be not more than sixty (60) days prior to such action. If no record date is fixed,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">record</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">date</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">determining</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">purpose</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">close</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">business</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">day</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">adopts</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">resolution</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">relating</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">thereto.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>39.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Registered<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Stockholders.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">entitled</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">recognize</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">exclusive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">right</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">registered</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">books</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">owner of shares to receive dividends, and to vote as such owner, and shall not be bound to recognize any equitable or other claim to or interest in such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">share or shares on the part of any other person whether or not it shall have express or other notice thereof, except as otherwise provided by the laws of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Delaware.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.18%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font>VIII</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:5.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:4pt;text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:27.09%;margin-right:27.09%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">OTHER<font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;"> </font>SECURITIES<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>OF<font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;"> </font>THE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.3pt;"> </font>CORPORATION</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 40. Execution of Other Securities. <font style="font-weight:normal;">All bonds, debentures and other corporate securities of the corporation, other than stock certificates</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">(covered</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">36),</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Chairperson</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Chief</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">President</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Vice</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">President,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">authorized</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">seal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">impressed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">facsimile</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">seal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">imprinted</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and attested by the signature of the Secretary or an Assistant Secretary, or the Chief Financial Officer or Treasurer or an Assistant Treasurer; </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">provided,</font><font style="font-style:italic;letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;">however, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">that where any such bond, debenture or other corporate security shall be authenticated by the manual signature, or where permissible facsimile</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signature, of a trustee under an indenture pursuant to which such bond, debenture or other corporate security shall be issued, the signatures of the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">persons signing and attesting the corporate seal on such bond, debenture or other corporate security may be the imprinted facsimile of the signatures of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such persons. Interest coupons appertaining to any such bond, debenture or other corporate security, authenticated by a trustee as aforesaid, shall be</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">signed by the Treasurer or an Assistant Treasurer of the corporation or such other person as may be authorized by the Board of Directors, or bear</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">imprinted thereon the facsimile signature of such person. In case any officer who shall have signed or attested any bond, debenture or other corporate</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">security, or whose facsimile signature shall appear thereon or on any such interest coupon, shall have ceased to be such officer before the bond,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">debenture or other corporate security so signed or attested shall have been delivered, such bond, debenture or other corporate security nevertheless may</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be adopted by the corporation and issued and delivered as though the person who signed the same or whose facsimile signature shall have been used</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">thereon</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">had</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">ceased</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.59%;margin-right:42.6%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:bold;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.59%;margin-right:42.6%;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE <font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">IX</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;"> </font></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:42.59%;margin-right:42.6%;font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:bold;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"><font style="font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">DIVIDENDS</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section 41. Declaration of Dividends. <font style="font-weight:normal;">Dividends upon the capital stock of the corporation, subject to the provisions of the Certificate of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">law,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">declared</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">law</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">regular</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">special</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meeting.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Dividends</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">paid</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">cash,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">property,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shares</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">capital</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">stock,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">subject</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">provisions</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Incorporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">law.</font></p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;text-indent:3.91%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>42.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Dividend<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Reserve.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Before</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">payment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">dividend,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">there</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">aside</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">out</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">funds</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">available</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">dividends</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">sum</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">sums</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">time,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">their</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">absolute</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">discretion,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">think</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">proper</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">reserve</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">reserves</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">meet</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">contingencies,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">for equalizing dividends, or for repairing or maintaining any property of the corporation, or for such other purpose as the Board of Directors shall think</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">conducive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">interests</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">modify</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">abolish</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">reserve</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">manner</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">which</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">it</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">was</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">created.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:0.95%;text-indent:3.91%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:8.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:44.54%;margin-right:44.56%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE X<font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;">FISCAL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.55pt;"> </font>YEAR</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;"> </font>43.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;"> </font>Fiscal<font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;"> </font>Year.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fiscal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">year</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">fixed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">resolution</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;">Directors.</font></p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.18%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:9pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:0.18%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">ARTICLE<font style="letter-spacing:-0.4pt;"> </font>XI</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:5.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top:4pt;text-align:center;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-left:35.9%;margin-right:35.83%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">INDEMNIFICATION</p>
<p style="margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;;font-size:9.5pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-left:4.88%;text-indent:0%;font-weight:bold;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;">Section<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>44.<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Indemnification<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>of<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Directors,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Officers,<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Employees<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>and<font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;"> </font>Other<font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;"> </font>Agents.</p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(a)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Directors and Officers. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The corporation shall indemnify its directors and officers to the fullest extent not prohibited by the DGCL or</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any other applicable law; </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided, however, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that the corporation may modify the extent of such indemnification by individual contracts with its</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors and officers; and, </font><font style="font-style:italic;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided, further, </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that the corporation shall not be required to indemnify any director or officer in connection with any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proceeding (or part thereof) initiated by such person unless (i) such indemnification is expressly required to be made by law, (ii) the proceeding was</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">authorized by the Board of Directors of the corporation, (iii) such indemnification is provided by the corporation, in its sole discretion, pursuant to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">powers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vested</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(iv)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">indemnification</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">required</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">paragraph</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(d)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(b)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Employees</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Agents</font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">indemnify</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font
