style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">employees</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">agents</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or any other applicable law. The Board of Directors shall have the power to delegate the determination of whether indemnification shall be given to any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">determine.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(c)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Expenses. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The corporation shall advance to any person who was or is a party or is threatened to be made a party to any threatened,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">pending or completed action, suit or proceeding, whether civil, criminal, administrative or investigative, by reason of the fact that he is or was a director</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or officer, of the corporation, or is or was serving at the request of the corporation as a director or officer of another corporation, partnership, joint</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">venture, trust or other enterprise, prior to the final disposition of the proceeding, promptly following request therefor, all expenses incurred by any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">connection</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proceeding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">however,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">that</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">requires,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">advancement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">expenses</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">incurred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or officer in his or her capacity as a director or officer (and not in any other capacity in which service was or is rendered by such indemnitee, including,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">without limitation, service to an employee benefit plan) shall be made only upon delivery to the corporation of an undertaking (hereinafter an</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">&#8220;undertaking&#8221;), by or on behalf of such indemnitee, to repay all amounts so advanced if it shall ultimately be determined by final judicial decision from</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which there is no further right to appeal (hereinafter a &#8220;final adjudication&#8221;) that such indemnitee is not entitled to be indemnified for such expenses</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Notwithstanding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">foregoing,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">unless</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">determined</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">pursuant</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">paragraph</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(e)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">no</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">advance</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall be made by the corporation to an officer of the corporation (except by reason of the fact that such officer is or was a director of the corporation in</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">which event this sentence shall not apply) in any action, suit or proceeding, whether civil, criminal, administrative or investigative, if a determination is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">reasonably</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">promptly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(i)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">majority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">directors</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">who</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">were</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">parties</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">proceeding,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">even</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">quorum,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(ii)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">committee</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such directors designated by a majority vote of such directors, even though less than a quorum, or (iii) if there are no such directors, or such directors so</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">direct, by independent legal counsel in a written opinion, that the facts known to the decision-making party at the time such determination is made</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">demonstrate clearly and convincingly that such person acted in bad faith or in a manner that such person did not believe to be in or not opposed to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">best</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">interests</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:0.89%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(d)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:68pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Enforcement. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Without the necessity of entering into an express contract, all rights to indemnification and advances to directors and</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officers</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">deemed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">contractual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rights</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">effective</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">same</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">extent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provided</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">contract</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">between</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation and the director or officer. Any right to indemnification or advances granted by this Section 45 to a director or officer shall be enforceable</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">behalf</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">holding</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">right</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">court</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">competent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">jurisdiction</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(i)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">claim</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">indemnification</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">advances</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">denied,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">whole</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or in part, or (ii) no disposition of such claim is made within ninety (90) days of request therefor. To the extent permitted by law, the claimant in such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">enforcement action, if successful in whole or in part, shall be entitled to be paid also the expense of prosecuting the claim. In connection with any claim</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">for indemnification, the corporation shall be entitled to raise as a defense to any such action that the claimant has not met the standards of conduct that</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">make it permissible under the DGCL or any other applicable law for the corporation to indemnify the claimant for the amount claimed. In connection</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">with any claim by an officer of the corporation (except in any action, suit or proceeding, whether civil, criminal, administrative or investigative, by</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">reason of the fact that such officer is or was a director of the corporation) for advances, the corporation shall be entitled to raise a defense as to any such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">action clear and convincing evidence that such person acted in bad faith or in a manner that such person did not believe to be in or not opposed to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">best interests of the corporation, or with respect to any criminal action or proceeding that such person acted without reasonable cause to believe that his</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or her conduct was lawful. Neither the failure of the corporation (including its Board of Directors, independent legal counsel or its stockholders) to have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">made a determination prior to the commencement of such action that indemnification of the claimant is proper in the circumstances because he has met</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">standard</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">conduct</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">set</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">forth</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">nor</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">actual</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">determination</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">(including</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Board</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of Directors, independent legal counsel or its stockholders) that the claimant has not met such applicable standard of conduct, shall be a defense to the</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font></p>
<hr style="page-break-after:always;width:100%;">
<p style="margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;text-indent:0%;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;"></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:0.89%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">action or create a presumption that claimant has not met the applicable standard of conduct. In any suit brought by a director or officer to enforce a right</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to indemnification or to an advancement of expenses hereunder, the burden of proving that the director or officer is not entitled to be indemnified, or to</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">advancement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">expenses,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">otherwise</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(e)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:67pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Non-Exclusivity of Rights. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The rights conferred on any person by this Section 45 shall not be exclusive of any other right which such</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">may</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">hereafter</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">acquire</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">statute,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">provision</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Certificate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Incorporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Bylaws,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">agreement,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">vote</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">stockholders</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or disinterested directors or otherwise, both as to action in his or her official capacity and as to action in another capacity while holding office. The</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation is specifically authorized to enter into individual contracts with any or all of its directors, officers, employees or agents respecting</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">indemnification</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">advances,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">fullest</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">extent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">prohibited</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">DGCL</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.43%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(f)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:66pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Survival</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Rights.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">rights</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">conferred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">ceased</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">employee</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">agent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">benefit</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font <p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:3.21%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(g)</font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font <p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:4.1%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(h)</font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">act</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font <p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:8.81%;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(i)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;font-weight:normal;margin-left:65pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">Saving Clause. </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">If this Section 45 or any portion hereof shall be invalidated on any ground by any court of competent jurisdiction, then</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the corporation shall nevertheless indemnify each director and officer to the full extent not prohibited by any applicable portion of this Section 45 that</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">not</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">been</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">invalidated,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">by</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law.</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">If</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">invalid</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">director</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">officer</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">full</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">extent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">applicable</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">law.</font></p>
<div align="left">
<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"  style="border-collapse:collapse; width:100%;">
<tr>
<td valign="top" style="width:9.77%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;">&nbsp;</p></td>
<td valign="top" style="width:2.01%;white-space:nowrap">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;text-decoration:none;Background-color:#auto;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;">(j)</font></p></td>
<td valign="top">
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;font-weight:bold;font-style:normal;color:#auto;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;font-family:Times New Roman;font-size:11pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;"></font><font style="font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"></font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">Certain</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;color:#000000;">Definitions.</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">For</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">purposes</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">of</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">this</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">45,</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">the</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">following</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">definitions</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="font-size:9pt;letter-spacing:-0.1pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="font-size:9pt;font-weight:normal;color:#000000;">apply:</font></p></td></tr></table></div>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:7.84%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(1)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The term &#8220;proceeding&#8221; shall be broadly construed and shall include, without limitation, the investigation, preparation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">prosecution,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">defense,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">settlement,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">arbitration</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">appeal</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">giving</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">testimony</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">threatened,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">pending</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">completed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">action,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">suit</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">proceeding,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">whether</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">civil,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">criminal,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">administrative</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">investigative.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:2.85%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(2)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">term</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8220;expenses&#8221;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">be</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">broadly</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">construed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">include,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">without</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">limitation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">court</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">costs,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">attorneys&#8217;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">fees,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">witness</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">fees,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">fines,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">amounts</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">paid</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">settlement</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">judgment</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">costs</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">expenses</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">nature</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">kind</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">incurred</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">connection</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">proceeding.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.07%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(3)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">The term the &#8220;corporation&#8221; shall include, in addition to the resulting corporation, any constituent corporation (including any</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">constituent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">constituent)</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">absorbed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">consolidation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">merger</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">which,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">separate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">existence</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">had</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">continued,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">would</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">had</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">power</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">authority</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.15pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">indemnify its directors, officers, and employees or agents, so that any person who is or was a director, officer, employee or agent of such constituent</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation, or is or was serving at the request of such constituent corporation as a director, officer, employee or agent of another corporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">partnership,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">joint</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">venture,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">trust</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">enterprise,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">stand</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">in</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">same</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">position</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">under</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">provisions</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">this</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">Section</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">45</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">resulting</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">surviving</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">as</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">he</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">would</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">have</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">constituent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">if</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">its</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">separate</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">existence</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">had</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">continued.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:5.17%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(4)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">References to a &#8220;director,&#8221; &#8220;executive officer,&#8221; &#8220;officer,&#8221; &#8220;employee,&#8221; or &#8220;agent&#8221; of the corporation shall include, without</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">limitation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">situations</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">where</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">such</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">is</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">serving</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">request</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">as,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">respectively,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">director,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">executive</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.25pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">officer,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.2pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">employee,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-2.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">trustee</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">agent</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">another</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">partnership,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">joint</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">venture,</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">trust</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">or</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">other</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">enterprise.</font></p>
<p style="text-align:left;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:5pt;margin-left:0.95%;margin-right:1.25%;text-indent:12.73%;font-weight:normal;font-style:normal;color:#auto;font-size:9pt;font-family:Times New Roman;text-transform:none;font-variant: normal;letter-spacing:0pt;"><font style="Background-color:#auto;text-decoration:none;">(5)</font><font style="font-size:11pt;margin-left:89pt;color:#000000;"></font><font style="color:#000000;">References to &#8220;other enterprises&#8221; shall include employee benefit plans; references to &#8220;fines&#8221; shall include any excise taxes</font><font style="letter-spacing:0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">assessed</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">on</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">a</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">person</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">with</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">respect</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">an</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">employee</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">benefit</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">plan;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">and</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">references</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">to</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">&#8220;serving</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">at</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">request</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.05pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">of</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">the</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">corporation&#8221;</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">shall</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">include</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">any</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;"> </font><font style="color:#000000;">service</font><font style="letter-spacing:-0.1pt;color:#000000;">
